<schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/contact" xmlns:cdt="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/commonDataTypes" xmlns:ocnt="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/otherContact" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <import namespace="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/commonDataTypes" schemaLocation="CommonDataTypes.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/otherContact" schemaLocation="OtherContact.xsd"/> <complexType name="Contact"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="cdt:identifier"/> <element name="externalIdFacilityAddress" type="cdt:externalIdentifier"/> <element name="externalIdFacilityContact" type="cdt:externalIdentifier"/> <element name="externalIdPhone" type="cdt:externalIdentifier"/> <element name="externalIdEmail" type="cdt:externalIdentifier"/> <element name="externalIdFax" type="cdt:externalIdentifier"/> <element name="externalIdPager" type="cdt:externalIdentifier"/> <element name="contactEntity" type="cdt:string500" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="regionCode" type="cdt:string10" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="contactType" type="cdt:string10" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="address1" type="cdt:string500" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="address2" type="cdt:string500" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="address3" type="cdt:string500" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="addressType" type="cdt:string500" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="city" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="state" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="countryCode" type="cdt:string10" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="countryName" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="postalCode" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="telecomAddress" type="cdt:string500" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="phone1" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="phone1Extension" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="phone2" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="phone2Extension" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="assistantPhone" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="pager" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="email" type="cdt:email200" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="fax" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="active" type="boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="createdBy" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="createdDate" type="dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="updatedBy" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="updatedDate" type="dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="otherContact" type="ocnt:OtherContact" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

<schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/commonDataTypes" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <simpleType name="email200"> <restriction base="string"> <pattern value="[^@]+@[^\.]+\..+"/> <maxLength value="200"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="identifier"> <restriction base="long"/> </simpleType> <simpleType name="externalIdentifier"> <restriction base="string"/> </simpleType> <simpleType name="email100"> <restriction base="string"> <pattern value="[^@]+@[^\.]+\..+"/> <maxLength value="100"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="char"> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="string6"> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="6"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="string10"> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="10"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="string20"> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="20"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="string25"> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="25"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="string50"> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="50"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="string100"> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="100"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="string200"> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="200"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="string500"> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="500"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="string1000"> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1000"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="string1500"> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1500"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="ordering"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="asc"/> <enumeration value="desc"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="UserSection"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="BasicDetail"/> <enumeration value="Facility"/> <enumeration value="Education"/> <enumeration <schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/site" xmlns:ucnct="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/userContact" xmlns:cnct="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/contact" xmlns:afy="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/additionalFacility" xmlns:cdt="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/commonDataTypes" xmlns:lms="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/lmsGenericFieldList" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <import namespace="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/userContact" schemaLocation="UserContact.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/contact" schemaLocation="Contact.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/additionalFacility" schemaLocation="AdditionalFacility.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/commonDataTypes" schemaLocation="CommonDataTypes.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/lmsGenericFieldList" schemaLocation="LmsGenericFieldList.xsd"/> <complexType name="Site"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="cdt:identifier"/> <element name="oldId" type="cdt:identifier"/> <element name="studyId" type="cdt:identifier"/> <element name="principalInvestigatorUserId" type="cdt:identifier"/> <element name="principalInvestigatorName" type="cdt:string500" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="principalInvestigatorFirstName" type="cdt:string500" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="principalInvestigatorLastName" type="cdt:string500" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="piTranscelerateUserId" type="cdt:string25" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="principalInvestigatorEmail" type="cdt:email200" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="principalFacilityId" type="cdt:identifier"/> <element name="transcelerateSiteId" type="cdt:identifier" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="name" <schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/userDeactivationData" xmlns:tns="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/userDeactivationData" xmlns:cdt="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/commonDataTypes" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <import namespace="http://sip.transcelerate.com/schemas/commonDataTypes" schemaLocation="CommonDataTypes.xsd"/> <complexType name="UserDeactivationLog"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="cdt:identifier"/> <element name="taskId" type="cdt:string100"/> <element name="requesterId" type="cdt:identifier" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="affectorId" type="cdt:identifier" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="adminId" type="cdt:identifier" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="studySiteMapList" type="tns:MapItem" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <element name="effectiveDate" type="dateTime" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="justificationId" type="cdt:identifier" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="isConfirmed" type="cdt:string6" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="status" type="cdt:string6" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="isSponsorSysUpdated" type="cdt:string6" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="comments" type="cdt:string500" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="createdDt" type="dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="createdBy" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="modifiedDt" type="dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="modifiedBy" type="cdt:string100" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="isForCause" type="cdt:string6" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="isStudySpecific" type="cdt:string6" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="replacingPIId" type="cdt:identifier" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="isApprovalReq" type="cdt:string6" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="isForDeactivation" type="cdt:string6" minOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="MapItem"> <sequence> <element name="studyId" nillable="true" type="cdt:identifier"/> <element name="siteId" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="cdt:identifier"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

con:config.script:
import org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils
String studyID1 = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("SIP_UserID") log.info (studyID1)
String studyID2 = studyID1 + "_" + RandomStringUtils.randomNumeric(3); log.info (studyID2) context.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("studyID2Param",studyID2)
String studyID3 = studyID1 + "_" + RandomStringUtils.randomNumeric(4); log.info (studyID3) context.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("studyID3Param",studyID3)

con:transfers.con:name: requestorID

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils(context)
String justID1=context.testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("justID1")
assert justID1 == "1"
String justDesc_1=context.testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("justDesc1")
assert justDesc_1 == "Standard"
String justID2=context.testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("justID2")
assert justID2 == "2"
String justDesc_2=context.testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("justDesc2")
assert justDesc_2 == "Expedited"

import java.text.DateFormat def today=new Date() String toDate=today.format("YYYY-MM-dd")
def startDate = toDate+"T00:00:00" //setting the startDate for getUserProfile testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("effectiveDate",startDate) //storing it to a TC prop

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils(context)
String studyID=context.testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("study_ID") log.info(studyID)
String studyID1=context.testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("DeactivatedStudyID1") assert studyID != studyID1
String studyID2=context.testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue("DeactivatedStudyID2") assert studyID != studyID2
